verses.roman:
jayādvaitācārya jaya jaya dayāmaya
jaya gaura-bhakta-gaṇa saba rasamaya

synonyms: jaya—all glories; advaita-ācārya—to Advaita Ācārya; jaya jaya—all glories; dayā-maya—merciful; jaya—all glories; gaura-bhakta-gaṇa—to the devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saba—all; rasa-maya—overwhelmed by transcendental bliss.
translation: All glories to Advaita Ācārya, who is very merciful! All glories to the devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who are always overwhelmed by transcendental bliss!
